Seo Ja-yeong

Korean: 서자영

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Seo Ja-yeong
Native name:

Birthday:
Feb 12, 1997
Age:
28 years old

Introduction

Seo Ja-yeong (서자영) is a South Korean independent singer-songwriter. She debuted on November 30, 2017, with the digital single "Midnight Lamp". She was a contestant on Mnet's I Can See Your Voice 7 and Folk Us in 2020.

Uncutpoint:
Jan 1, 2021-Jul 31, 2023

Nov 30, 2017-Dec 31, 2019

Fun facts

1
Seo Ja Yeong performed a cover of "Someone You Loved" (by Lewis Capaldi) and "Psycho" (by Red Velvet) on the "gru:v" YouTube channel in 2020.
…
2
Seo Ja Yeong performed "Wine" (오늘 취하면) (by Suran, Changmo, prod. Suga of BTS) and "A Night of Counting the Stars" (별 헤는 밤) (by Kim Dae Young) with Choi Yuree during episode 4 of Mnet/tvN's survival show "Folk Us" on December 11, 2020.
…
3
Seo Ja Yeong performed "Shallow" (A Star Is Born OST by Lady Gaga & Bradley Cooper) and "Love Yourself" (by Justin Bieber) during episode 7 of Mnet/tvN's variety show "I Can See Your Voice 7" on February 28, 2020.
…
4
Seo Ja Yeong participated as the singer of "Feel" and "Quixotic" on the "Lies of P" game OST.
…
